summary.para: Registers the app's input pane handler object to receive notifications on behalf of a window when an event triggers the input pane. This method differs from in that it references its window through an object that implements ICoreWindow.

param.name: pWindow
param.para: A pointer to the window (an object that implements ICoreWindow) for which the handler should listen for input pane events.

param.name: pHandler
param.para: An interface pointer to the handler instance for this app.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.para: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives a cookie for that can be used later to unregister the handler through the method.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Registers the app's input pane handler object to receive notifications on behalf of a window when an event triggers the input pane. This method differs from in that it references its window through an HWND.

param.name: hwnd
param.para: The handle of the window for which the handler should listen for input pane events.

param.name: pHandler
param.para: An interface pointer to the handler instance for this app.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.para: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives a cookie for that can be used later to unregister the handler through the method.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the current location of the input pane.

param.name: prcInputPaneScreenLocation
param.para: A pointer to a structure that, when this method returns successfully, receives the location of the input pane, in screen coordinates. If the input pane is not visible, this structure receives an empty rectangle.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Unregisters an app's input pane handler object so that it no longer receives notifications.

param.name: dwCookie
param.para: A cookie that identifies the handler. This value was obtained when you registered the handler through the method.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides methods that enable apps to be informed of state changes and location for the input pane. The input pane is a UI element, an on-screen keyboard or handwriting panel, that appears when the user performs an action that requires them to enter information, such as selecting a search box or an entry field in a form. Apps can then adjust their UI so that the input pane does not obscure items that the user might need to access while the input pane is shown.

remarks.para: Do not implement this interface; the implementation is supplied with Windows as CLSID_FrameworkInputPane.
